title: EADO furnished home for rent! Month-Month available!
posting_body: ['Fully furnished 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home.', 'Includes fully stocked kitchen, 2 bedrooms with full mattresses, 1 bedroom with a convertible full size futon, and living room with a tv, sectional, and convertible sofa bed.', 'Sheets and linens provided.', 'Outdoor seating and grill.', 'Washer/dryer.', 'Fully fenced home with paved carport area.', 'Utilities included!', 'Minutes away from east downtown nightlife, MinuteMaid & PNC stadium, downtown, and the medical center!', '10 minute walk to the metrorail!', 'The house is a bit older and in an up and coming neighborhood, but it it clean, safe and close to everything!', 'Pets allowed for an additional $100/month.', '1 month stay minimum.', '1 to 2 months- $3,350 per month', '3 to 5 months- $2,950 per month', '6 months- $2,450 per month', 'Owner lives in a separated apartment unit in the front of the house.', 'Shared laundry room access, but the remainder of the property is exclusively the tenants.', 'Owner pays for water and wifi.', 'Tenant pays for electricity and gas.', 'No smoking allowed indoors.', 'Thermostat controls the front and back units, so we ask that you keep it on at all times and set between 68-78 degrees.', 'Shared laundry area.']
